name: Inn at St. Peter's Village

reviews.title: Perfect Small Inn with Great Service
reviews.text: We stayed at the Inn on a Saturday night in February. We had the Govenor's Suite which was a large sitting room and bedoom. The Inn just opened recently and the furnishings are wonderful. A large king bed, lots of pillows and two comforter made for an easy night's sleep. The sitting area had room for us to have friends back to our suite after dinner. Overall it's a really nice get away spot.

aka: Inn At St. Peter`s Village Hotel
